00012 #define MAKE_ADDRESS( base, offset )            ( GLintptr )( ( ( unsigned char* )(base) ) + (offset) )

00015 template < typename _T >
00016 _T* CopyArray( const _T* src, unsigned int count, unsigned int maxCount )
00017 {
00019         if ( !count || src == 0 )
00020                 return 0;
00021 
00023         _T* a = new _T[ Max( count, maxCount ) ];
00024         MemCopy( a, src, count * sizeof( _T ) );
00025         return a;
00026 }

00037 GrMeshVB::GrMeshVB( unsigned int vertexCount, const SVec3* positions, const SVec3* normals, const SVec3* biNormals,
00038                                     const SVec3* tangents, const unsigned long* colors, const SVec2* texCoords, unsigned int flags,
00039                                         unsigned int maxVertexCount, bool cacheData )
00040 : _vertexBuffer( 0 )
00041 , _vertexCount( vertexCount )
00042 , _components( 0 )
00043 , _flags( flags )
00044 , _dirty( _cacheData ? ~0 : 0 )
00045 , _positions( cacheData ? CopyArray( positions, vertexCount, maxVertexCount ) : 0 )
00046 , _normals( cacheData ? CopyArray( normals, vertexCount, maxVertexCount ) : 0 )
00047 , _biNormals( cacheData ? CopyArray( biNormals, vertexCount, maxVertexCount ) : 0 )
00048 , _tangents( cacheData ? CopyArray( tangents, vertexCount, maxVertexCount ) : 0 )
00049 , _colors( cacheData ? CopyArray( colors, vertexCount, maxVertexCount ) : 0 )
00050 , _texCoords( cacheData ? CopyArray( texCoords, vertexCount, maxVertexCount ) : 0 )
00051 , _normalStart( 0 )
00052 , _biNormalStart( 0 )
00053 , _tangentStart( 0 )
00054 , _colorStart( 0 )
00055 , _texCoordStart( 0 )
00056 , _stride( 0 )
00057 , _size( 0 )
00058 , _maxVertexCount( Max( maxVertexCount, vertexCount ) )
00059 , _cacheData( cacheData )
00060 {
00062         if ( positions )
00063         {
00064                 _components |= GR_ATTRIB_POSITION_MASK;
00065                 _stride += 12;
00066         }
00067 
00068         if ( tangents )
00069         {
00070                 _components |= GR_ATTRIB_TANGENT_MASK;
00071                 _tangentStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00072                 _stride += 12;
00073         }
00074 
00075         if ( biNormals )
00076         {
00077                 _components |= GR_ATTRIB_BINORMAL_MASK;
00078                 _biNormalStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00079                 _stride += 12;
00080         }
00081 
00082         if ( normals )
00083         {
00084                 _components |= GR_ATTRIB_NORMAL_MASK;
00085                 _normalStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00086                 _stride += 12;
00087         }
00088 
00089         if ( texCoords )
00090         {
00091                 _components |= GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_MASK;
00092                 _texCoordStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00093                 _stride += 8;
00094         }
00095 
00096         if ( colors )
00097         {
00098                 _components |= GR_ATTRIB_COLOR_MASK;
00099                 _colorStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00100                 _stride += 4;
00101         }
00102 
00104         _size = _stride * _maxVertexCount;
00105 }

00108 GrMeshVB::GrMeshVB( unsigned int vertexCount, unsigned int usedComponents, unsigned int flags, bool cacheData )
00109 : _vertexBuffer( 0 )
00110 , _vertexCount( vertexCount )
00111 , _components( usedComponents )
00112 , _flags( flags )
00113 , _dirty( _cacheData ? ~0 : 0 )
00114 , _positions( 0 )
00115 , _normals( 0 )
00116 , _biNormals( 0 )
00117 , _tangents( 0 )
00118 , _colors( 0 )
00119 , _texCoords( 0 )
00120 , _normalStart( 0 )
00121 , _biNormalStart( 0 )
00122 , _tangentStart( 0 )
00123 , _colorStart( 0 )
00124 , _texCoordStart( 0 )
00125 , _stride( 0 )
00126 , _size( 0 )
00127 , _maxVertexCount( vertexCount )
00128 , _cacheData( cacheData )
00129 {
00131         if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_POSITION_MASK )
00132         {
00133                 if ( cacheData )
00134                         _positions = new SVec3[ vertexCount ];
00135                 _stride += 12;

00138         if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_TANGENT_MASK )
00139         {
00140                 if ( cacheData )
00141                         _tangents = new SVec3[ vertexCount ];
00142                 _tangentStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00143                 _stride += 12;
00144         }
00145 
00146         if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_BINORMAL_MASK )
00147         {
00148                 if ( cacheData )
00149                         _biNormals = new SVec3[ vertexCount ];
00150                 _biNormalStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00151                 _stride += 12;
00152         }
00153 
00154         if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_NORMAL_MASK )
00155         {
00156                 if ( cacheData )
00157                         _normals = new SVec3[ vertexCount ];
00158                 _normalStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00159                 _stride += 12;
00160         }
00161 
00162         if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_MASK )
00163         {
00164                 if ( cacheData )
00165                         _texCoords = new SVec2[ vertexCount ];
00166                 _texCoordStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00167                 _stride += 8;
00168         }
00169 
00170         if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_COLOR_MASK )
00171         {
00172                 if ( cacheData )
00173                         _colors = new unsigned long[ vertexCount ];
00174                 _colorStart = ( void* )( size_t )_stride;
00175                 _stride += 4;
00176         }
00177 
00179         _size = _stride * _maxVertexCount;
00180 }

00182 //----------------------------------------------------------
00183 GrMeshVB::~GrMeshVB()
00184 {
00185         delete[] _positions;
00186         delete[] _normals;
00187         delete[] _biNormals;
00188         delete[] _tangents;
00189         delete[] _colors;
00190         delete[] _texCoords;
00191 
00192         if ( _vertexBuffer )
00193                 GrDeleteVB( _vertexBuffer );
00194 }

00201 //----------------------------------------------------------
00202 void
00203 GrMeshVB::AdjustVertexCount( int growSize )
00204 {
00206         int t = _vertexCount + growSize;
00207         B_ASSERT( ( ( t > 0 ) || ( t < ( int )_maxVertexCount ) ) );
00208 
00210         _vertexCount = t;
00211 
00213         Evict();
00214 }

00216 //----------------------------------------------------------
00217 void
00218 GrMeshVB::MarkAsDirty( unsigned int components )
00219 {
00220         B_ASSERT( _cacheData );
00221         _dirty = components & _components;
00222 }

00224 //----------------------------------------------------------
00225 void
00226 GrMeshVB::UploadUncached( unsigned int writeOffset, const void* source, unsigned int sourceSize )
00227 {
00228         Cache();
00229         GrBindVB( _vertexBuffer );
00230         bglBufferSubData( GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, writeOffset, sourceSize, source );
00231 }

00233 //----------------------------------------------------------
00234 void
00235 GrMeshVB::Cache()
00236 {
00237         if ( !_vertexBuffer )
00238         {
00240                 if ( _cacheData )
00241                         _dirty = ~0;
00242 
00244                 _vertexBuffer = GrGenVB();
00245                 GrBindVB( _vertexBuffer );
00246                 bglBufferData( GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, _size, 0, ( ( _flags & kDynamic ) != 0 ) ? GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW : GL_STATIC_DRAW );
00247         }
00248 }
00249 
00250 //----------------------------------------------------------
00251 void
00252 GrMeshVB::Evict()
00253 {
00254         if ( _vertexBuffer )
00255         {
00256                 GrDeleteVB( _vertexBuffer );
00257                 _vertexBuffer = 0;
00258         }
00259 }
00260 
00261 //----------------------------------------------------------
00262 void
00263 GrMeshVB::Bind( unsigned int components )
00264 {
00267         B_ASSERT( ( components & _components ) == components );
00268 
00270         if ( !_vertexBuffer )
00271                 Cache();
00272 
00274         GrBindVB( _vertexBuffer );
00275 
00277         if ( _dirty != 0 )
00278         {
00279                 PackData();
00280                 _dirty = 0;
00281         }
00282 
00284         if ( components & GR_ATTRIB_POSITION_MASK )
00285                 GrStreamArrayPointer( GR_ATTRIB_POSITION_INDEX, 3, ET_FLOAT, false, _stride, 0 );
00286 
00287         if ( components & GR_ATTRIB_TANGENT_MASK )
00288                 GrStreamArrayPointer( GR_ATTRIB_TANGENT_INDEX, 3, ET_FLOAT, false, _stride, _tangentStart );
00289 
00290         if ( components & GR_ATTRIB_BINORMAL_MASK )
00291                 GrStreamArrayPointer( GR_ATTRIB_BINORMAL_INDEX, 3, ET_FLOAT, false, _stride, _biNormalStart );
00292 
00293         if ( components & GR_ATTRIB_NORMAL_MASK )
00294                 GrStreamArrayPointer( GR_ATTRIB_NORMAL_INDEX, 3, ET_FLOAT, false, _stride, _normalStart );
00295 
00296         if ( components & GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_MASK )
00297                 GrStreamArrayPointer( GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_INDEX, 2, ET_FLOAT, false, _stride, _texCoordStart );
00298 
00299         if ( components & GR_ATTRIB_COLOR_MASK )
00300                 GrStreamArrayPointer( GR_ATTRIB_COLOR_INDEX, 4, ET_UNSIGNED_BYTE, true, _stride, _colorStart );
00301 
00303         GrStreamSetArrayState( components );
00304 }

00306 //----------------------------------------------------------
00307 void
00308 GrMeshVB::PreContextReset()
00309 {
00311         if ( _vertexBuffer )
00312                 GrDeleteVB( _vertexBuffer );
00313 }
00314 
00315 //----------------------------------------------------------
00316 void
00317 GrMeshVB::PostContextReset() 
00318 {
00320         if ( _vertexBuffer )
00321         {
00322                 _vertexBuffer = 0;
00323                 Cache();
00324         }
00325 }

00332 //----------------------------------------------------------
00333 void
00334 GrMeshVB::PackData()
00335 {
00337         B_ASSERT( GrGetVB() == _vertexBuffer );
00338 
00343         unsigned char* buffer = ( unsigned char* )bglMapBuffer( GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, GL_WRITE_ONLY_ARB );
00344         unsigned char* mem = buffer;
00345         CHECK_GL();
00346 
00348         for ( unsigned int vertex = 0; vertex < _vertexCount; ++vertex )
00349         {
00350                 if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_POSITION_MASK )
00351                 {
00352                         *( ( SVec3* )mem ) = _positions[ vertex ];
00353                         mem += 12;
00354                 }
00355 
00356                 if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_TANGENT_MASK )
00357                 {
00358                         *( ( SVec3* )mem ) = _tangents[ vertex ];
00359                         mem += 12;
00360                 }
00361 
00362                 if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_BINORMAL_MASK )
00363                 {
00364                         *( ( SVec3* )mem ) = _biNormals[ vertex ];
00365                         mem += 12;
00366                 }
00367 
00368                 if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_NORMAL_MASK )
00369                 {
00370                         *( ( SVec3* )mem ) = _normals[ vertex ];
00371                         mem += 12;
00372                 }
00373 
00374                 if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_MASK )
00375                 {
00376                         *( ( SVec2* )mem ) = _texCoords[ vertex ];
00377                         mem += 8;
00378                 }
00379 
00380                 if ( _components & GR_ATTRIB_COLOR_MASK )
00381                 {
00382                         *( ( unsigned long* )mem ) = _colors[ vertex ];
00383                         mem += 4;
00384                 }
00385         }
00386 
00387         B_ASSERT( ( size_t )( mem - buffer ) <= ( size_t )_size );
00388 
00390         GLboolean success = bglUnmapBuffer( GL_ARRAY_BUFFER );
00391         B_ASSERT( success );
00392 }

00394 //----------------------------------------------------------
00395 void
00396 GrMeshVB::PretransformVertices( UFastArray< SVec3 >& results, const MMat4x4& transform )
00397 {
00399         results.Reserve( results.GetReserved() + _vertexCount );
00400 
00402         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _vertexCount; ++i )
00403         {
00404                 SVec3 transformed( transform.TransformCoordNoPersp( _positions[ i ] ) );
00405                 results.Push( transformed );
00406         }
00407 }
